c74object.name: the.jit.amygdala
c74object.digest: Rebuild spectral fft frames from a named matrix during offline video rendering.
c74object.description:
Written by Tim Heinze Â© 2020, www.xenorama.com.
Iterates through and thereby rebuilds realtime recorded fft frames (using the.jit.amygdala~) and is to be placed after any named jit.matrix populated by the latter.
It supports matrices of single-dimension (horizontal) but multiple planes.
Its counterpart the.jit.amygdala~ is to be fed with amplitude and bin index of a spectral signal, likewise replacing a corresponding jit.poke~.

objarg.name: render-context
objarg.digest: Specify a named render context for all children objects to sync to.
objarg.description: For convenience, this can be identical to one's world render context name but is to be considered independent. It is necessary to provide a context name for all members of the offline render family to sync and respond to.

objarg.name: matrix-name
objarg.description: The name of the jit_matrix to access (default = 0). Identical to the matrix used before with jit.poke

attribute.name: active
attribute.description:
Set the active flag. There are 4 active states available suitable for different purposes:
0 = ignore this object and pass everything through without recording or recalling
1 = operate normally (default); playback, record and output during rendering
2 = (idle)
3 = playback and record normally but do not output data during rendering
4 = record and output during rendering but never pass incoming data
5 = mute all activity
Note that while recording is disabled, the automatic export upon recording completion (if an exportname is specified) is also disabled and previous files will not be overwritten.

method.name: jit_matrix
method.description: Being connected to the jit_matrix of the same name as the matrix-name, it sends its data through to be processed further. When rendering video offline, the.jit-.amygdala reproduces previously recorded matrices out its leftmost outlet instead.

method.name: preview
method.description: Output the corresponding fft frame at the normalised position while not rendering by jit.world.
